CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 6, 1951, pg. 8 reads: "Engaged - Atty. and Mrs. T.B. Hamilton announce the engagement of her niece, Vivian V. Clayton, of Detroit and Pittsburgh, to George B. Greenlee Jr., of this city. The charming Vivian is the daughter of Mrs. Walker Smith of Detroit and William H. Clayton of Monessen, Pa.  She is a senior at Wayne University, Detroit, and is a member of Alpha Kappa Alpha Sorority.  Mr. Greenlee is the son of George B. Greenlee Sr., and is a graduate of the Pharmacy School of the University of Pittsburgh.  He is a former member of the 332nd Fighter Group and the 477th Medium Bomber Group.  The wedding date has not been set. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Vivian Clayton wearing dark short sleeved dress with small brooch, seated on edge of patterned sofa, in front of light colored wall
